Translations.Text: Keubit sulet that haba jipeugah â€˜Eleumee jih tan jikheun keu batat Dudoe jih meuhat hana meuubah Hana jiteupue narit raya that Raya akibat teubiet lam babah
Sang-sang di gata wahe Muhammad Gadoh seumangat sabab that gundah Han jitem pateh gata peuingat Gata han mangat droe tapeususah
Kamoe nyang peujeuet bandum lat-batat Hiasan meuhat bumoe nyang indah Kamoe ci kalon hamba nyang taÊ»at Amai nyang got that jipubuet bagah
Kamoe peujeuet lom tanoh subur that Barangsoe hajat jitueng phaedah
Peue na tasangka wahe Muhammad Saboh riwayat ajeb sileupah l Ureueng lam guha pinto ka meucap Nyoe saboh ayat kuasa Allah

Padum droe ureueng muda-muda that Lam guha meuhat keudeh geulangkah Teuma geulakee ubak Hadharat C Keu kamoe rahmat Neubri ya Allah Neubri beuleumah jalan nyang teupat Bak buet nyoe meuhat kamoe bek salah
Teuma ureueng nyan kheundak Hadharat Mate dum siat lam guha beukah Padum thon mate di sinan meuhat
Teuma Hadharat peubangket bagah Neukeumeung kalon ureueng nyang ceupat Geukira ligat padum thon leupah
Tadeungo jinoe Kamoe riwayat Tuhan Hadharat meunan Neupeugah Haba sibeunar ureueng muda that Bandum cit meuhat iman keu Allah Meutamah lagi tunyok Hadharat

Ate meuikat hana meupisah Pemuda beudoh laju mupakat Tuhan Hadharat laju geupeugah Tuhan geutanyoe nyang Po lat-batat Bumoe ngon langet peuneujeuet Allah Han jeuet tapeugah laen Hadharat Dacha raya that tanyoe bak Allah
Kawom gatanyoe bandum ka sisat Jikheun Hadharat ka le sileupah Hana alasan naritjih meuhat Elanya that-that sulet keu Allah Jipeuna-peuna narit sulet that Keubit raya that jipubuet salah
